This script standardizes the annual catch rasters by net primary production.

```{r setup, message=F,warning=F}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 6, fig.height = 4, fig.path = 'figs/',message = FALSE, eval=F, warning = FALSE)

source('~/github/ohiprep/src/R/common.R')

library(seaaroundus)
library(raster)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(parallel)
library(RColorBrewer)

mollCRS <- CRS('+proj=moll') #set mollweide CRS

cols = rev(colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(11, 'Spectral'))(255)) # rainbow color scheme
```


# Primary production data

Load NPP data

```{r}
npp_files <- list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/VGPM_primary_productivity/int/annual_npp'),full.names=T)[1:12]

```

# Standardize catch

`catch_npp_fun` is a function that reads in a catch raster, reprojects & resamples it then divides by npp for the same year and saves the output.

```{r}

catch_npp_fun <- function(file,layer){
  
  catch <- raster(file)
  
  yr <- substr(file,nchar(file)-7,nchar(file)-4)
  
  npp <- npp_files[str_detect(npp_files,yr)]%>%raster()
  
  c <- catch%>%
        projectRaster(crs = mollCRS,over=T)%>%
        resample(npp,method = 'ngb')%>%
        overlay(.,npp,fun=function(x,y){x/y})
  
  writeRaster(c,filename = paste0(file.path(dir_M),'/marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch_npp/',layer,'/',layer,'_',yr,'.tif'))  
  
}

```

## Apply the function
```{r, eval=F}

dem_d_files <- list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch/dem_dest'),full.names=T)[54:65]
dem_nd_hb    <-list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch/dem_nondest_hb'),full.names=T)[54:65]
dem_nd_lb    <-list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch/dem_nondest_lb'),full.names=T)[54:65]
pel_hb    <-list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch/pel_hb'),full.names=T)[54:65]
pel_lb    <-list.files(file.path(dir_M,'marine_threats/impact_acceleration/v2016/stressors/comm_fish/output/annual_catch/pel_lb'),full.names=T)[54:65]


lapply(dem_d_files,catch_npp_fun,layer = 'dem_dest')
lapply(dem_nd_hb,catch_npp_fun,layer = 'dem_nondest_hb')
lapply(dem_nd_lb,catch_npp_fun,layer = 'dem_nondest_lb')
lapply(pel_hb,catch_npp_fun,layer = 'pel_hb')
lapply(pel_lb,catch_npp_fun,layer = 'pel_lb')
```
